explains: n. 片刻，瞬间；某一时刻；现在，目前；时机，机会；（事物发展的）关头，转折点；重大，重要；力矩；矩，动差

sentences.en: It was a really scary moment.
I wanted to savour every moment.
sentences.cn: 我要细心品味，一刻也不错过。

sentences.en: The moment of decision had arrived.
